synopsis.text: Shiki Magata, a prodigious programmer with a dark past, has been living in seclusion on a remote island research facility for years. Souhei Saikawa, an associate professor of architecture and admirer of Magata's work, and Moe Nishinosono, a math prodigy and Saikawa's student, embark on a vacation to the island to meet Magata. However, their meeting is abruptly interrupted when they stumble upon a grisly murder inside the sealed research lab. With the lab locked down and danger lurking at every corner, Saikawa and Nishinosono must unravel the complex web of secrets and clues to solve the murder mystery and uncover the truth behind Magata's enigmatic past. As they delve deeper into the case, they realize that this may be the last mystery they ever attempt to solve. Welcome to THE PERFECT INSIDER, where nothing is as it seems, and danger lurks in every corner.
